Introduction

This index provides links to some useful pages in the documentation:

  • Usage instructions - how to use this library in a web browser or a NodeJS application.

  • How to contribute - if you want to understand the code, develop, contribute.

  • Upgrading - if you are using older versions and wish to benefit from newer features.

  • Legacy Documents - Original documentation (external link). Outdated.

  • API Reference for important entities:

    • Stomp
    • Client

  • Change Log

By Codo 2.1.2 ✲ Press H to see the keyboard shortcuts ✲ @netzpirat ✲ @_inossidabile

    Quickly fuzzy find classes, mixins, methods, file:

    • T Open fuzzy finder dialog

    Control the navigation frame:

    • L Toggle list view
    • C Show class list
    • I Show mixin list
    • F Show file list
    • M Show method list
    • E Show extras list

    You can focus and blur the search input:

    • S Focus search input
    • Esc Blur search input
